description: The humor lies in the playful use of words relating to temperature.
title: Cool Companions
n_1: On a snowy field, Snowman stands proudly.
c1_1: Isn't it a bit chilly today?
c1_2: I could use a warm scarf.
n_3: They share a silent moment, enjoying the breeze.
n_4: As the sun sets, their shadow blends into the horizon.
